title: Nevada City Elks holds annual hoop shoot
content: The Nevada City Elks’ free basketball shoot contest is open to all boys and girls ages 8 to 13. The event will begin at 10 a.m. on Oct. 10 at Chicago Park Grade School. Registration is free. The hoop shoot will include free hotdogs, sodas and prizes. For more information, call 530-272-5371.
